GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|popul.description: Path to geojson file storing polygons of populations.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|popul.label: Polygons of populations

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|yoi.description: List of years for which landcover should be extracted (maximum range 1992 - 2020).
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|yoi.label: Years of interest

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|lc_cl.description: List of landcover class identifiers to be extract (for identifiers see https://savs.eumetsat.int/html/images/landcover_legend.png)
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|lc_cl.label: Landcover classes

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|lcyy.description: Tif file showing the year-by-year disrtribution of land cover classes of interest.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_LCY.yml@115|lcyy.label: Land cover year-by-year

metadata.name: Get landcover cover change 1992-2020
metadata.description: Component of the Genes from Space tool. Given an area of interest, the tool creates a raster stack describing habitat presence for landcover classes and for years of interest (allowed time window range: 1992-2020).

references.text: ESA. Land Cover CCI Product User Guide Version 2. Tech. Rep. (2017)
